Entries.1: It's a page from {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AbigailName}}'s Diary^^'Things I love: the smell of carved pumpkin, keeping an amethyst under my pillow, chocolate cake, the thrill of spicy eel, and the comfort of Mom's blackberry cobbler (I like to eat!)'%revealtasteAbigail276%revealtasteAbigail66%revealtasteAbigail220%revealtasteAbigail226%revealtasteAbigail611
Entries.2: It's {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SamName}}'s holiday shopping list^^Everyone's favorites^^{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/SebastianName}}: Frozen Tear, Sashimi^{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}}: Emerald, Poppy^{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentName}}: Grape, Cranberry Candy^Mom: Crispy Bass, Pancakes^{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/KentGender}}}}: Risotto, Roasted Hazelnuts^Me: Cactus, Maple Bar, Pizza%revealtasteSebastian84%revealtasteSebastian227%revealtastePenny60%revealtastePenny376%revealtasteVincent398%revealtasteVincent612%revealtasteJodi214%revealtasteJodi211%revealtasteKent649%revealtasteKent607%revealtasteSam90%revealtasteSam731%revealtasteSam206
Entries.3: It's written in {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LeahName}}'s handwriting^^My idea of a perfect dinner would be salad, goat cheese, truffle, and wine. For dessert I'd need a poppyseed muffin. Yum! If someone gave me one of those things, I'd melt.%revealtasteLeah196%revealtasteLeah426%revealtasteLeah430%revealtasteLeah348%revealtasteLeah651
Entries.4: It's a note of {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MaruName}}'s^^Parts still needed for my greatest invention yet!^^*Gold Bar^*Iridium Bar^*Battery Pack^*Diamond^*Strawberries%revealtasteMaru336%revealtasteMaru337%revealtasteMaru787%revealtasteMaru72%revealtasteMaru400
Entries.5: It's {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/PennyName}}'s handwriting:^^I want to get everyone something they love!^^Mom: Parsnip, Glazed Yams, NO BEER!^{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/JasName}}: Fairy Rose, Plum Pudding^{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/VincentName}}: Pink Cake, Grape^{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/GeorgeGender}}}}. Mullner: Leek, Fried Mushroom^Granny Mullner: Beet, Tulip%revealtastePam24%revealtastePam208%revealtastePam346%revealtasteJas595%revealtasteJas604%revealtasteVincent398%revealtasteVincent221%revealtasteGeorge20%revealtasteGeorge205%revealtasteEvelyn284%revealtasteEvelyn591
Entries.6: Stardrop Saloon Special Orders^^Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/LewisName}}: Autumn's Bounty^(Double order of high-fiber bread on the side)^^{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/MarnieName}}: Pumpkin Pie^(extra whipped cream!)^^{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/DemetriusName}}: Bean Hotpot^(Make it spicy)^^{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/CarolineName}}: Fish Taco^(she wants triple the sauce! Better throw in a few extra napkins...)%revealtasteLewis235%revealtasteMarnie608%revealtasteDemetrius207%revealtasteCaroline213
Entries.7: It's a page from someone's diary...^^...There are only a few 'older' bachelors in town, and none of them are perfect! {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyName}} is really anxious and weak, but I know {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyGender}}}} would make a loyal and devoted {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Husband:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyGender}}}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HarveyGender}}}} likes coffee and pickles.^^{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottName}} is a bit foppish and melodramatic, but {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottGender}}}} does have a nice chin. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ElliottGender}}}} likes crab cakes and pomegranates.^^{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneName}} is messy and anti-social. But I think {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneGender}}}} gruff exterior is a defense mechanism, insulating {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/His:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneGender}}}} softness from the world. {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/ShaneGender}}}} likes Beer, Pizza, and Pepper Poppers.%revealtasteHarvey395%revealtasteHarvey342%revealtasteElliott732%revealtasteElliott637%revealtasteShane346%revealtasteShane206%revealtasteShane215
Entries.8: ^To {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}^^Hope you two are doing well! We've sent you your favorite gifts: Pink Cake and Sunflowers for {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}}, Gemstones and Wool for {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}!^^-Love Mom and Dad%revealtasteHaley221%revealtasteHaley421%revealtasteEmily440%revealtasteEmily66%revealtasteEmily62%revealtasteEmily60%revealtasteEmily70%revealtasteEmily64%revealtasteEmily68
Entries.9: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexName}}'s Strength Training Diet:^^*Complete Breakfast^*Salmon Dinner^^(I've learned to love this food... I can feel the protein!!)%revealtasteAlex201%revealtasteAlex212
Entries.22: Greetings, @...^^Have you found my 'secret' in the dark tunnel?^^I look forward to meeting you!^^    -{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/QiName}}
